capabilities.capability: This transformation allows IAP users to get a value from an object based on the JSON Pointer

entryPoint.name: Get Value From JSON Pointer - IAP

inputs.name: jsonPointer
inputs.description: A string that provides a reference to a specific value within a JSON document

outputs.name: value
outputs.type: array, boolean, string, number, object, null
outputs.description: The value obtained using JSON pointer

name: Get Value From JSON Pointer - IAP
overview: Get a value from an object using JSON Pointer
webName: Get Value From JSON Pointer - IAP
